name: Dark Blue Hotmail
description: This style changes your normal boring hotmail into a blue wonderland@@@! For all of you blue fans. Next I'll make an orange one lol. Created by: K. Rampling. For any reference you give out, or show in any video, please put a small reference in the corner saying By: K. Rampling. Enjoy Blue Hotmail! **Sorry if screenshots are unreadable. This is due to the picture being to large and taking up too much memory on the site.**
